name: Princess Kidnapper VR
description: As a mad bully, you are no longer satisfy with ordinary girls. Therefore, you chose a beautiful princess and kidnapped her back to your castle. But soon, the king's army came to rescue her, so you have to shoot them down in order to make the kidnapping successful. This game is a pure archery madness.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
recommended_requirements: OS: WINDOWS 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
